message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1800000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you have a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value goes beyond that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for it. I'm counteroffering at $1600000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1500000, but I think that's the maximum I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1600000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1580000.
I appreciate your willingness to make a slight adjustment, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1550000, but I think that's the maximum I can go. Can you consider that?
I understand you're getting close to your maximum, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1560000, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1560000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1540000, which is my absolute maximum. Can you consider that?
I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $1560000, Bob. I'm not willing to give up more value for the product. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $1560000.
